result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for John T Oberjat
Current: 110 W 2nd St N Apt 2, Ladysmith, WI 54848 United States  (Effective: 11-04-2015)
Prior: N5069 Hwy 73, Trailer A, Glen Flora, WI 54526

Defendant John T Oberjat in court with attorney Annette M Barna.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 15CM78,15CM92,15CM98,14CM141.  Court recites case settlement into the court record.  Court instructs on plea questionnaire/waiver of rights.  

14CM141-CT 1-NC.  Sentence for time served 20 days jail, CC 

15CM75-DRI

15CM78-CT'S 2,3,4-DRI.  CT 1-NC

15CM92-CT'S 1, 3,4,5,6-DRI.  CT 2-NC

15CM98-CT'S 1,2,3-DRI. 

Court will accept and find the DE guilty.  Court will accept the recommendations of the parties.  Withhold sentence, 2 yrs probation, CC, will come from bond money posted.

ADDRESS INFO for John T Oberjat
Current: N5069 Hwy 73, Trailer A, Glen Flora, WI 54526   (Effective: 07-01-2015)
Prior: N5069 Hwy 73, Trailer A, Ladysmith, WI 54526

Defendant John T Oberjat in court with attorney Annette M. Barna.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 15CM75, 15CM78-both INIT APP.  Waive reading of the CC,  enter a plea of NG to misd counts.  Atty would like to revisit the issue of no contact with Julie Houle. State would like a $5000.00 bond in all cases, with same conditions.  Victim is completing the TO Shelter program, when completed the paperwork will be filed in COCC office and no contact will be lifted, but all contact will remain abusive/violence free.
Paperwork completed by Julie J Houle with TO Shelter,  filed in 14CM141
NO POSSESSION OR CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOL, NOT TO BE IN ANY BARS, TAVERNS OR ANY ESTABLISHMENTS WHICH THE PRIMARY SALE IS ALCOHOL.  CONCURRENT WITH 15CM78, 14CM141 AND 15GF144.
NO POSSESSION OR CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOL, NOT TO BE IN ANY BARS, TAVERNS OR ANY ESTABLISHMENTS WHICH THE PRIMARY SALE IS ALCOHOL.
